details: Worked in both French and English
Team of 5 legal experts
Managed a portfolio of 250 external clients, both French and international, from various sectors and industries (working with over 60 different collective agreements)
Collabored with 65 internal employees, mainly payroll managers and accountants
Answered all inquiries related to labor law, payroll, and international mobility (research, document analysis, and client specificities)
Drafted legal documents and technical briefs on labor law
Conducted social audits to assess compliance with regulations
Led internal training sessions on labor law for employees
Carried out legal monitoring and wrote information notes on current legal developments
Handled various HR administrative tasks: supplementary social protection, employee secondment, parafiscal taxes, etc.

Performed a 5-month HR mission at Intel Corporation: supervised 2 consultants in the reorganization of employee records, managed expense reports and training paths, and followed up on contract terminations

Réponse à toute question en droit social, paie et mobilité internationale (recherche, analyse de documentation et des spécificités sectorielles)

Démarches administratives RH diverses : protection sociale complémentaire, détachement de salariés, taxes parafiscales, etc.
